root.name: Dark Age of Camelot: Trials of Atlantis
root.description: Includes three new races, nine new Master Levels, and twenty all new domains such as undersea areas. Even more graphical updates than Shrouded Isles."Before Atlantis sank beneath the waves, trials were devised for those who might one day brave perils on land and sea to explore this mythic civilization. Only the worthy will survive the Trials' deep oceans, dusty deserts and lava-filled lands to capture the knowledge and power of Atlantis."
